item.title: Killed enemy but xp wont come?-solved
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

anything else i should remove? its not for slayer, i just used that format

its now

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 7 { temp.addSkillXP(100, 19); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; temp.sM("You have killed a farming monster and have been rewarded"); }

should it be

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 7 { temp.addSkillXP(100, 19); temp.sM("You have killed a farming monster and have been rewarded"); }

and when i removed the && temp.taskID == 7 ) { i get an error

item.title: Killed enemy but xp wont come?-solved
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

i added this so when you kill the farmer(npc#7) you should get 100 xp in farmingâ€¦

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 7 && temp.taskID == 7 ) { temp.addSkillXP(100, 19); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0 || temp.taskAmount == 1) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; temp.sM("You have killed a farming monster and have been rewarded"); }

but when i kill the npc i dont get 100 farm xp? any help appreciated
